ImplementedSecurityControls.AccessControl: The onlyowner modifier is applied to owner functions to restrict their usage.
ImplementedSecurityControls.DepositLimit: Deposits are limited to 1 ETH to standardize participation.

FallbackFunctionality.FallbackFunction: The fallback function calls init() to start the deposit process if the contract receives ether.

TimeSensitiveLogic.FeeCollection: Fees are transferred to the owner's address at the end of each join transaction.
